line.comment: * ^^^ an array of any of the 7 resources which the galaxy desperately needs more of
* if the galaxy doesn't need anything right now we randomly move around
* or craft the least available resource
* Nomad TLs are 6 times faster than player's mobile factories

line.text: ' without having enough resources for it. Restarting...'

line.comment: * Nomads always need to move to another faction. Flagship moves at a minimum distance of 8 jumps

sval.val: without having enough resources for it. Restarting...
^^^ an array of any of the 7 resources which the galaxy desperately needs more of
if the galaxy doesn't need anything right now we randomly move around
or craft the least available resource
Nomad TLs are 6 times faster than player's mobile factories
Nomads always need to move to another faction. Flagship moves at a minimum distance of 8 jumps
